bug.author: rabbit008
bug.description:
1.The coordinate name in the current intermediate result graph ("Intermediate") is not the same as the title of the table ("Intermediate Count"), which may make users feel confused. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28092647/64515744-becc0780-d31f-11e9-8b94-1245c3fb06be.png></denchmark-link>
2.Currently, we have 7 optional columns available, this 1.1-release will add new columns like starttime and endtime, maybe we need to limit the maximum number of columns added to the table. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28092647/64516099-76f9b000-d320-11e9-8b2e-fb17de3bf8f7.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: use # Intermediate Result for both then.
